00017 import socket
00018 import traceback
00019 import sys
00020 from _common import SocketEOF as _SocketEOF
00021 from lsm import LsmError, error, ErrorNumber
00022 import _transport
00023 from lsm.lsmcli import cmd_line_wrapper
00024 
00025 
00026 def search_property(lsm_objs, search_key, search_value):
00027     """
00028     This method does not check whether lsm_obj contain requested property.
00029     The method caller should do the check.
00030     """
00031     if search_key is None:
00032         return lsm_objs
00033     return list(lsm_obj for lsm_obj in lsm_objs
00034                 if getattr(lsm_obj, search_key) == search_value)
00035 
00036 
00037 class PluginRunner(object):
00038     """
00039     Plug-in side common code which uses the passed in plugin to do meaningful
00040     work.
00041     """
00042 
00043     @staticmethod
00044     def _is_number(val):
00045         """
00046         Returns True if val is an integer.
00047         """
00048         try:
00049             int(val)
00050             return True
00051         except ValueError:
00052             return False
00053 
00054     def __init__(self, plugin, args):
00055         self.cmdline = False
00056         if len(args) == 2 and PluginRunner._is_number(args[1]):
00057             try:
00058                 fd = int(args[1])
00059                 self.tp = _transport.TransPort(
00060                     socket.fromfd(fd, socket.AF_UNIX, socket.SOCK_STREAM))
00061 
00062                 #At this point we can return errors to the client, so we can
00063                 #inform the client if the plug-in fails to create itself
00064                 try:
00065                     self.plugin = plugin()
00066                 except Exception as e:
00067                     exception_info = sys.exc_info()
00068 
00069                     self.tp.send_error(0, -32099,
00070                                        'Error instantiating plug-in ' + str(e))
00071                     raise exception_info[1], None, exception_info[2]
00072 
00073             except Exception:
00074                 error(traceback.format_exc())
00075                 error('Plug-in exiting.')
00076                 sys.exit(2)
00077 
00078         else:
00079             self.cmdline = True
00080             cmd_line_wrapper(plugin)
00081 
00082     def run(self):
00083         #Don't need to invoke this when running stand alone as a cmdline
00084         if self.cmdline:
00085             return
00086 
00087         need_shutdown = False
00088         msg_id = 0
00089 
00090         try:
00091             while True:
00092                 try:
00093                     #result = None
00094 
00095                     msg = self.tp.read_req()
00096 
00097                     method = msg['method']
00098                     msg_id = msg['id']
00099                     params = msg['params']
00100 
00101                     #Check to see if this plug-in implements this operation
00102                     #if not return the expected error.
00103                     if hasattr(self.plugin, method):
00104                         if params is None:
00105                             result = getattr(self.plugin, method)()
00106                         else:
00107                             result = getattr(self.plugin, method)(
00108                                 **msg['params'])
00109                     else:
00110                         raise LsmError(ErrorNumber.NO_SUPPORT,
00111                                        "Unsupported operation")
00112 
00113                     self.tp.send_resp(result)
00114 
00115                     if method == 'plugin_register':
00116                         need_shutdown = True
00117 
00118                     if method == 'plugin_unregister':
00119                         #This is a graceful plugin_unregister
00120                         need_shutdown = False
00121                         self.tp.close()
00122                         break
00123 
00124                 except ValueError as ve:
00125                     error(traceback.format_exc())
00126                     self.tp.send_error(msg_id, -32700, str(ve))
00127                 except AttributeError as ae:
00128                     error(traceback.format_exc())
00129                     self.tp.send_error(msg_id, -32601, str(ae))
00130                 except LsmError as lsm_err:
00131                     self.tp.send_error(msg_id, lsm_err.code, lsm_err.msg,
00132                                        lsm_err.data)
00133         except _SocketEOF:
00134             #Client went away and didn't meet our expectations for protocol,
00135             #this error message should not be seen as it shouldn't be occuring.
00136             if need_shutdown:
00137                 error('Client went away, exiting plug-in')
00138         except Exception:
00139             error("Unhandled exception in plug-in!\n" + traceback.format_exc())
00140 
00141             try:
00142                 self.tp.send_error(msg_id, ErrorNumber.PLUGIN_BUG,
00143                                    "Unhandled exception in plug-in",
00144                                    str(traceback.format_exc()))
00145             except Exception:
00146                 pass
00147 
00148         finally:
00149             if need_shutdown:
00150                 #Client wasn't nice, we will allow plug-in to cleanup
00151                 self.plugin.plugin_unregister()
00152                 sys.exit(2)
